alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 18 at 8:12PM MST until June 19 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Northeastern Coconino and northwestern Apache counties, including Keams Canyon, Kaibito, Canyon De Chelly, Chinle, Kayenta, Wupatki National Monument, Tuba City, Winslow, Holbrook, Snowflake, St. Johns, Springerville, Heber, Happy Jack, Forest Lakes, Navajo National Monument, Dilkon and Kykotsmovi. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
